entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
